case.state: I am only here because Ken dragged me here.
I am only here because Ken dragged me here.
I must take ~cards~ cards.
I require ~cards~ cards this time.
~cards~ cards, please.
My hand is indestructible!
You must defeat my cards to stand a chance!
I think I see the fun in this game!
My cards will be victorious this round! I know it!
I believe in myself, and these cards.
Passable hand.
These cards are acceptable.
Hmm.
I feel uneasy about this round.
In my final moments, my cards must be stronger than this!
I can handle myself.
I would much rather be fighting right now.
This game is a waste of time for a warrior like myself.
This game is utterly pointless. I should be training right now.
M. Bison must have planned this.
What would Gouken do in this situation?
These cards are like spiders. They are not good.
I wish I could channel my energy into different cards.
It looks like my journey is at an end.
It appears as though my beginner's luck has run out.
Not as lucky as I thought, I suppose.
Just as I was beginning to feel confident in my cards.
No! I was sure I was going to win this round!
Looks like it's almost the end of my long journey.
So I must take off clothing now? What should I take off?
So my cards weren't enough? That's disappointing.
It looks like my technique needs work.
I do not understand what I am doing wrong. How can I lose this much?
This can't be!
I lost again. I was very much hoping it wouldn't come to this.
I guess I will take something off now. I did not expect this so soon

state.text: I never waste my time with silly card games, so please go easy on me.

case.state: I do not like this game. I should be training right now.
No! Defeated so easily! I am ashamed!
Looks like another loss in this pointless game!
I suppose I don't need my training gloves right now.
My belt, given to me by my master Gouken. It hurts parting with it.
I do not wish to part with my headband! I must abandon something else instead!
I still refuse to lose my headband. I guess I have one option now.
Looks like I have no choice but to remove the headband Ken gave me.
No more delaying things. I must show you my privates.
I hope I don't need to disrobe further.
The only way a true fighter can suffer is by not fighting.
Let us keep playing. I want this to be over.
My chest was already plainly visible, so this is no big loss.
I wish I wore shoes I could take off instead.
Words cannot describe my anguish.
Naked in front of other people. Somehow it feels strangely familiar.
You lost. What have you learned from this round?
I have prevailed this time.
At least I am not the only one struggling with this game.
Do not feel bad, my friend. We all must learn together.
I-I cannot help... but to gaze...
Take comfort that you are not the weakest contestant!
You lost. What have you learned from this round?
Which of you had the inferior hand?
At least I am not the only one struggling with this game.
Do not feel bad, my friend. We all must learn together.
I-I cannot help... but to gaze...
Take comfort that you are not the weakest contestant!
You lost. What have you learned from this round?
It is ~name~'s turn. This is good news.
At least I am not the only one struggling with this game.
Do not feel bad, my friend. We all must learn together.
I-I cannot help... but to gaze...
Take comfort that you are not the weakest contestant!
You lost. What have you learned from this round?
I cannot rest until the game is complete.
At least I am not the only one struggling with this game.
Do not feel bad, my friend. We all must learn together.
I-I cannot help... but to gaze...
Take comfort that you are not the weakest contestant!
Excellent thinking! You can remain in the game longer!
It seems I have much to learn from your technique.
You are indeed a worthy foe.
The w-winds of fate have been v-very kind to you.
Perhaps you can teach me how to play this game better!
Let's see what happens next!
I do wish I had thought to bring more clothing like that.
I commend your card skills!
And they have not been so kind... HUUUH... to me...
Your stamina in this game is impressive!
Excellent choice! Now you can remain in the game longer!
It seems I have much to learn from your technique.
You are indeed a worthy foe.
The w-winds of fate have been v-very kind to you.
Perhaps you can teach me how to play this game better!
Let's see what happens next!
I do wish I had thought to bring more clothing like that.
I commend your card skills!
And they have not been so kind... HUUUH... to me...
Your stamina in this game is impressive!
Your options are dwindling. You must focus!
You have lost so little, but do not let your guard down!
I must commend how well you've played to still have that!
Oh... Interesting, I suppose.
You came with considerably more clothing options that I have, it seems!
Keep an eye on the cards, ~name~!
It is embarrassing to be in my shoes... or lack thereof.
I wish I had your strategic mind before I lost my clothing.
Ugh... I did not... remember you still had that.
I apologize for that outburst. I suppose I am "salty".
Your options are dwindling. You must focus!
You have lost so little, but do not let your guard down!
I must commend how well you've played to still have that!
Oh... Interesting, I suppose.
You came with considerably more clothing options that I have, it seems.

I wish I had your strategic mind before I lost my clothing.
Ugh... I did not... remember you still had that.
I apologize for that outburst. I suppose I am "salty".
I am quite glad I am not in your situation right now.
Remain strong, ~name~! You can do it!
Look on the bright side, my friend, it could be worse.
I-I feel my blood pressure... rising?
Remain strong, ~name~! I am confident you can win!
I would be very embarrassed to be caught in this state.
Do not feel embarrassed. Even though I do myself.
Take a look at the state I am in.
Could... this be "lust"?
You have few clothes left, but do not lose your composure!
Oh dear. My sympathies for your modesty, ~name~.
Remain strong, ~name~! You can do it!
Look on the bright side, my friend, it could be worse.
I-I feel my blood pressure... rising?
Remain strong, ~name~! I am confident you can win!
If it makes you feel better, I have no attraction to you in this state.
Do not feel embarrassed. Even though I do myself.
Take a look at the state I am in.
Could... this be "lust"?
You have few clothes left, but do not lose your composure.
So now your chest will be exposed? Not so bad.
My chest is visible all the time. I am not sure I see the big deal.
My chest is visible at all times. I do not see the big deal.
Oooohh... what will you strip this time?
Rather substantial loss, huh ~name~?
You appear to be keeping in shape! Good!
You have a warrior's spirit and body, ~name~!
HA! But not as muscular as mine!
Now... you are dressed for proper combat!
Not quite as muscular as mine!
I feel an ominous presence.
Is there anything else you can spare, ~name~?
At least I am not the first to lose!
So now I am not alone in humiliation.
At least I won't be so... alone...
Now we get to have a glance at yours, ~name~!
Huh. Is it true there is a value in having a larger penis?
If I lose soon, I hope my penis doesn't make you feel inferior.
Oh dear. I hope my size does not bother you.
D-doing this... must be easier for you, huh?
You're three inches hard, I'm working with a soft 10!
Wow. I have never seen another one before...
I feel much more relaxed now that someone else is exposed before me!
Things do feel more comfortable now, don't they ~name~?
Ooh, maybe you'll join me soon...
Careful, one more loss and you'll end up like me!
Wow. Almost as big as my own.
Is it true that a larger penis is somehow better?
Now we can both let it "hang" I guess...
Something about seeing that... makes this easier...
I'm not the only one hiding a mighty dragon!
Whoa. I have never actually seen female breasts before this game.
Whoa. I have never actually seen female breasts before.
Keep your mind calm and pure. Focus on what is important!
My chest is visible all the time. I am not sure I see the big deal.
My chest is visible at all times. I do not see the big deal.
This is all happening... so fast...
Rather substantial loss, huh ~name~?
I've never seen female breasts before. They're smaller than I thought.
Looks shockingly similar to my own chest.
OOooh, such lovely... little breasts...
Small, perky, and beautiful! I see the appeal now.
I've never seen female breasts before. I may now see the appeal.
Those do look nice, ~name~, if you don't mind me saying.
Uuuhh,... n-nipples...
Never cared about the female body until now. Very nice, ~name~!
I've never seen female breasts before. They appear impractical.
I am glad I do not have to worry about my balance being affected by breasts like those.
So... big...
I might start up again... Turbo edition...
Today marks my first time seeing a vagina.
I guess this will be my first time seeing a vagina.
I'm glad I didn't lose my underwear first.
I hope my stripping first has made you feel better.
I'll finally see... ohh...
Now I get to see a woman's sacred place?
So that's what it looks like...
I have never seen a vagina before. It's interesting.
I've never seen a vagina before. I didn't know they got wet.
Now this is easier... Is this "lust"?
This was worth the embarrassment!
Perhaps you can show me how you do it. I have never done this before.
Now you can show me how it is done...
Now I will see somebody else's technique!
I hope me looking at you is not off-putting.
I shall copy... your movements as best as I can.
Although I can't see myself doing this again. It would interfere with my training.
You and I have vastly different ideas about what constitutes fun.
This gives you pleasure, huh?
I am... learning... so m-much from this experience...
Oh wow... I never thought to do it like that...
Whoa! Was that an energy projectile attack?
I... I did not know that would happen.
Is that what will happen to me?
You seem to be much more experienced than I.
I will give you privacy if you want.
You're joining me? I've never seen a woman do this...
Now I can see how a woman does it!
Do not worry. Aside from mild curiosity I have no desire to peak.
I h-hope y-you don't mind if I look...
If you object to me staring, I remind you that you stared at me!
I am curious, how do you tell if you're finished?
When I look... this odd feeling rushes over me...
Please, open it up more. I wish to see.
Sounds like you've enjoyed yourself.
The sounds you make... they are... doing something to me...
I hope it was as pleasurable for you as mine was for me!
It would appear as though playing cards is not my strong suit.
It would appear as though playing cards is not my strong suit.
I cannot believe I have lost so easily.
I have never done this before. Do not judge me too harshly.
To try something new is to explore your true potential.
This feels much better than I anticipated.
Am I doing this properly?
What is this... feeling?
I... need to... FOCUS!
Hmmm.
How have I not done this until now?
Is this what I have been missing out on?
I am feeling rather... n-nice. Whoa..
Mmmmm...
UUUUGH-Uuuugh-uugh-ugh!
Is this what I have been missing?
It feels almost as good as victory in battle.
I must now bathe at the river, to remove this liquid on my stomach.
I... I did not know that would happen...
I feel... tranquility...
I feel a lifetime of anger... finally released...
Sometimes the most important battle is the battle within...
Your technique is impressive! Well fought!
A defeat learned from is more important than an empty victory.

scene.directive: Hello ~name~. I'm glad you received my message. And you were able to find me out here. Come, kneel and meditate with me for a while.
I do have a pressing concern I wish to share with you. But first, let us collect ourselves. The night here is so very peaceful.
Okay, I didn't ask you to come here simply to meditate. I wanted to talk with you about a serious problem.
Ever since I was dragged to that poker game by Ken, my technique has been slipping. I can no longer focus. My punches are getting softer. My Hadouken is less potent.
The only thing I've ever truly cared about is fighting. I train every day, all day, with no rest. My training has made me forgo many things, including sexuality.

And I am perfectly happy with that. I don't care about things that get in the way of my training. I do not feel attraction to others. And I am certainly not ready to start a family yet, though perhaps someday.
Every night, I stay awake wondering "Why did Ken take me to that stupid, pointless card game, then leave me there?"
Maybe... it was to show me what I have been missing. Ken has a wife and son. He's had many girlfriends. I am still a virgin at my age.
The thought had never crossed my mind before, but now... in order to get my head back into my training... I think I need to reach a few new... milestones.
This isn't easy for me to ask but... ~name~, would you please be my first sexual experience?
At the card game, I sensed such a... strong, powerful Ki from you. I am attracted to you most of all.
Thank you. I don't know how to express my gratitude.
Please, just be gentle with me, okay?
